currentStudents.name: Brian De Anda
currentStudents.detailSummary: I am a Computer Science and Information Technology student with a concentration in Software Engineering and I'm currently attending California State University, Monterey Bay. I am interested in expanding my developing skills towards mobile applications that can have a positive impact in a person's life.
